comment: I have everything and anything he may need on hand at the ready. The nurse loved him. She said he was probably her most at ease client as he got the jab. The silver lining of being a Diabetic
amr:
# ::snt I have everything and anything he may need on hand at the ready. The nurse loved him. She said he was probably her most at ease client as he got the jab. The silver lining of being a Diabetic
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03

            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / everything
                        :ARG1-of (n / need-01
                              :ARG0 (h2 / he)
                              :ARG1-of (p / possible-01)))
                  :op2 (a2 / anything
                        :ARG1-of n
                        :ARG0 h2
                        :ARG1-of (r / ready-02))))
      :snt2 (l / love-01
            :ARG0 (n2 / nurse)
            :ARG1 (h3 / he))
      :snt3 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (s2 / she)
            :ARG1 (h4 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (c / client
                        :domain (h5 / he))
                  :ARG2 (e2 / ease-05

                  :ARG3 (m2 / most)
                  :mod (p2 / probable)
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01

                              :ARG0 h5
                              :ARG1 (j / jab)))))
      :snt4 (l2 / line
            :mod (s3 / silver)
            :topic (d / diabetes)))
